level.text: An education program shall maintain course records for at least five (5) years following course completion. The records shall be maintained in a manner to prevent loss, destruction, or unauthorized use and shall contain the following:
A complete outline for each course given, including a brief overview, instructional objectives, comprehensive topical outline, method of evaluation, and a record of participant performance;
A record of the time, place, and date that each course is given;
A record of the number of CE hours awarded for the CE course;
A curriculum vitae or resume for each instructor; and

A roster signed by course participants that shall include the name and certificate number of each person who has taken any certification, refresher or CE course, class, or activity, and a record of any course completion certificate issued.
